resources.string: If this button is on, it will read to you a sentence at a time. If it is off, it will read to you one word at a time
After a word or multiple words have been highlighted, this button will start reading to you. Once it starts playing, it will turn to a stop button.
If settings mode is set to read one word at a time, it will highlight the sentence of each word that was selected on the page.
Highlights the entire page for you
After the dictionary is finished setting up, you can hold down on a word and the dictionary definition will pop up.
